snippet.title: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Tick Tock: A Tale for Two on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/790740/Tick_Tock_A_Tale_for_Two/

You and your friend find yourselves trapped in two magical clockwork worlds where you have to solve puzzles to escape. Neither of you have the whole picture so the only way to get out is to communicate what you see to the other player. Play on two devices, local or remotely, all you need is a voice connection. 

For more information about the game visit: https://www.ticktockthegame.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OtherTales
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/othertalesinteractive/

Production Company: HUSARREST 
DIR: Josefin Lindeberg 
DOP: David Sandberg 
SOUND: David Sandberg
Still Photographer: Patrick Jarnfelt
